definition: The term "unvermeidlich" refers to something that cannot be avoided or prevented. It is commonly used to describe situations, events, or outcomes that are inevitable or bound to happen, regardless of efforts made to prevent them.

examples.german: Es ist unvermeidlich, dass sich die Preise erhöhen.
examples.english: It is inevitable that prices will rise.

examples.german: Es war unvermeidlich, dass er scheitern würde.
examples.english: It was inevitable that he would fail.
